updateElements.mainHeader: There is a critical security update available
updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart during this update
updateElements.subHeader: Updates can take around 30 minutes to complete
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that BriteTech and Security can accurately protect your device.

If you do not update your device, you may lose access to some items necessary for your day-to-day tasks, including but not limited to Okta and Slack.

To begin the update, simply click on the Update Device button and follow the provided steps. If your Mac reports that there are no updates available, restart your computer and try again.
updateElements.mainContentNote: Important Notes: please save all your work before starting the update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around 30 minutes to complete
updateElements.oneDayDeferralButtonText: Tomorrow, even if Okta and Slack is blocked
